bibl.title: An Egyptian Hoard of the Second Century A.D. (Numismatic Notes and Monographs. 54.)
bibl.note: Purchased by E.T. Newell in Cairo in December 1923. Two hoards mixed together: coins of the Peloponnesus and of Rhodes (II-I cent. B.C.) and Roman denarii (I-II cent. A.D.).
Weber Shirley H., An Egyptian Hoard of the Second Century A.D. (Numismatic Notes and Monographs. 54.)
New York, The American Numismatic Society, 1932, 8Â°, iv-41 pp. et 3 pll.
